Title: Dispossessed Thunderers
Intro: Each model in a Dispossessed Thunderers unit is armed with a Duardin Handgun.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Veteran. A Veteran is armed with a Brace of Duardin Pistols instead of a Duardin Handgun.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit if it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Drummer. You can add 1 to charge rolls for this unit if it includes any Drummers.

Rules.Name: Precision Fire
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Add 1 to hit rolls for this unitâ€™s Duardin Handguns if it has not made a normal move in the same turn.
